chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4

chunks.text: So let's talk about what was the question.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: So the question is, write an HTML and CSS code to style a paragraph inside a div which contains 5 other paragraphs.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: So here is a div and inside the div you have 5 more paragraphs.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: And here you can see that the first paragraph must have a background color yellow and text color red.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: So this is the first paragraph that you have given the condition for it.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: And the rest of the paragraphs have a background color blue and text color white.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: So to solve this problem, what I will do first is that I will put the background color blue in all my paragraphs.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: As it was said, by the way, I hit the control enter if you don't know.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: Suppose your cursor is here and you want to bring it in a new line.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: I will keep telling you these things.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: Hit the control enter, it will come straight down here.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: If your cursor is here, hit the control enter, it will come straight down.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: And here you can see that its background color is blue and text color is white.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: So all the paragraphs will have a background color blue and text color white.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4

chunks.text: Then after this, what will I do?

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4

chunks.text: So the first paragraph will be like this.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: And all the other paragraphs will be the same as we have styled.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: So this was very simple.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: People have also used the nth child pseudo selector.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: In the nth child, if the first child is the first child, then such a property will be applied to the paragraph.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: In the nth child, suppose you make it 2.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: So if the P is the second child, then it will be applied.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: Suppose I do it and show you.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: Because we have come here to learn CSS.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: If I make nth child 2 and put it here, then you see the property will be applied to the second child.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: See, this means that this property is applied to P when it is the second child of your parent.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: This is what it means.

chunks.title: Exercise 2 - Solutions and Shoutouts  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #27.mp4
chunks.text: So I hope you understood this thing.
